markdownRemark.html:
Search NPM registry

Github

Problem

  • I want to be able to search the NPM registry with text inputs.
  • I want to list out the results of the search and see details like name of the package, author and package updated date.
  • I want to be able to route to a separate page so that the users can view details of the package.

Solution

  • What if NPM registry sends back a million results? Pagination.
  • would mean

Stack

  • Programming Languages: Typescript
  • Frontend: NextJS(React), Material UI
  • Testing: Cypress for automated end-to-end testing
  • Misc: Axios

Accomplishments
